agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Agriculture & Livestock TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, April 29, 2019 PLACE: E2.036 CHAIR: Rep. Drew Springer SB 814 Seliger Relating to the performance of equine dentistry by students of equine dental provider certification programs. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
